Our Playbooks

A collection of our co-created rituals and strategies for connection.

The 'Check-In' Ritual

A simple ritual for us to reconnect when we feel distant. 1. One of us initiates by saying 'I'd love to check-in.' 2. We find a quiet moment and each share one thing on our mind, and one thing we appreciate about the other person today.

Mutually cherished!

The 'Safe Word' for Arguments

When a discussion gets too heated, either of us can say 'Sanctuary'. This means we pause the conversation for 10 minutes to cool down, no questions asked.

Mark as a favorite
